name: Rogue Soccer
description:
Is this some sort of nightmare? You and your best friend just wanted to practice some football behind the block, but the mean grannies in the neighborhood have swooped down upon you, hell-bent on taking your ball away and ruining your fun. Adding insult to injury, the local stray dogs have made a home on the football field, and they some none too happy to see you.

But the thought of backing down does not even cross your mind. You will persevere and score a goal at the other end of the field. You will show these grannies what a real sportsman is made of! You will survive and triumph!

How to play?

Just take the ball and try to score a goal on the other side of the field. Beware! Old ladies cuts your ball and stun you with the bag. Dogs only stun.
